description: An over-the-counter pain relieving medication developed and marketed in Arkyre, however, due to their lack of medical advancements, it is not nearly as effective as human-made painkillers, and it typically has only found its way to Earth from tourism. It could still be useful in a pinch, though.

An auto-injector designed to be used as a slow-release painkiller, developed and marketed for use in Arkyan hospitals or as a prescription. However, due to their lack of medical advancements, it is not nearly as effective as human-made painkillers, and it typically has only found its way to Earth from tourism. It could still be useful in a pinch, though.

use_action.activation_message: You inject yourself with the injector.
